entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as long and lanky. He is one of the people sitting in Aunt Petunia's house.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as having bushy hair tied back in a long plait. She is one of the people sitting in Aunt Petunia's house.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are described as grinning identically. They are two of the people sitting in Aunt Petunia's house.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is described as badly scarred and long-haired. He is one of the people sitting in Aunt Petunia's house.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is described as kind-faced, balding, with his spectacles a little awry. He is one of the people sitting in Aunt Petunia's house.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is described as battle-worn, one-legged, with his bright blue magical eye whizzing in its socket. He is one of the people sitting in Aunt Petunia's house.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is described as having short hair that is her favorite shade of bright pink. She is one of the people sitting in Aunt Petunia's house.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is described as grayer and more 45. He is one of the people sitting in Aunt Petunia's house.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as having a gleaming work surface and spotless appliances.

relationships.description: Ron and Hermione are sitting together in Aunt Petunia's house.
Fred and George are leaning against Aunt Petunia's appliances.
Bill is sitting on Aunt Petunia's work surface.
Mr Weasley is leaning against Aunt Petunia's appliances.
Mad-Eye is leaning against Aunt Petunia's appliances.
Tonks is sitting on Aunt Petunia's work surface.
Lupin is leaning against Aunt Petunia's appliances.
